alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 9:24PM CDT until May 30 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Deuel County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 824 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Lemoyne to near Barton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Chappell, Oshkosh, Big Springs, Brule, Lewellen, Barton, Lemoyne, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Eagle Gulch Campground, Ruthon, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Megeath, Broganville, Otter Creek Campground, Lake View Campground and Ash Hollow State Historical Park. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 79 and 103. Highway 92 between mile markers 115 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 80 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
